      • response

        @POST
@Path(value="/response")
@Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String response(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                           java.lang.String uname,
                                           @FormParam(value="email")
                                           java.lang.String email,
                                           @FormParam(value="password")
                                           java.lang.String pass)
        Action function to response to signup request, This function will act as a controller part and it will calls RegistrationService to make registration
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        email - provided user email
        pass - provided user password
        Returns:
        Status string

      • home

        @POST
@Path(value="/home")
@Produces(value="text/html")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response home(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                                java.lang.String UserName,
                                                @FormParam(value="password")
                                                java.lang.String UserPassword)
        Action function to response to login request. This function will act as a controller part, it will calls login service to check user data and get user from datastore
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        pass - provided user password
        Returns:
        Home page view

      • AcceptFriendRequest

        @POST
@Path(value="/AcceptFriendRequest")
@Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String AcceptFriendRequest(@FormParam(value="UserEmail")
                                                      java.lang.String UserEmail,
                                                      @FormParam(value="FriendEmail")
                                                      java.lang.String FriendEmailToAdd)
        This method act as a controller where we handle user request and call services to make accept friend process
        Parameters:
        UserEmail - the user who will accept friend request
        FriendEmailToAdd - the one who should receive a notification if user accept friend request .
        Returns:
        String representing status of user request if successful or not .
